model_input:

Speaker B: I mean I always recommend Karate since that's what I study! I can bring you by the dojo sometime if you want to see what it is like. 
Speaker A: OMG!! That would be so awesome, Yes please.  When is a good time for you?
Speaker B: Awesome! Tomorrow afternoon anytime between 3-6 would work for me!
Speaker A: Perfect. I will meet you at the Dojo at 3pm. I really appriciate it, and I will buy you lunch after too. 
Speaker B: That's great! I can bring some guest passes to the pool I lifeguard at as well! I'm working this weekend if you want to come when I am working. Where do you want to eat?
Speaker A: I defiantly will. As well a bucket of sunscreen, safety in the sun first.  I was thinking that new sandwhich shop by the collage that just opened, what do nyou think? 
Speaker B: Oh yeah gotta bring that SPF 100! The new deli sounds great. I have been craving cold cuts! 
Speaker A: I personally use SPF Vampire HAHA! Fantastic. Yeah they have this Italian sub im dying to try. 

MEMORY 1:

Speaker B also practices karate and holds a green belt, while attending football games at their old high school and finding that their football background helps in karate footwork.

Speaker A is ambitious and driven towards their career goals.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly and engaging relationship, sharing movie recommendations and discussing their respective interests. Speaker B shows interest in Speaker A's preferences and activities, asking questions and engaging in conversations about movies, seafood, and education.

Event Description:
- Speaker A ordered a big seafood platter and recommended a movie to Speaker B.
- Speaker B thanked Speaker A for the movie recommendation and mentioned their interest in karate and IT work.
- Speaker A went to the beach and tanned, while Speaker B mentioned their love for the ocean and water activities.
- Speaker A recommended clams from Quebec and is taking French classes, while Speaker B signed up for classes at the local college.
- Speaker B and their girlfriend attend every home football game, benefiting from their football background in studying karate.

prediction:
